name: Saturnine83
body: i think the first mistake you made in your journey is conflating ethnic nationalism with racialism the cause of whites in europe is different from the cause of whites elsewhere europeans define themselves by nationality which is usually derived from a common ethnic background whites elsewhere define themselves by race the two causes have common enemies and share many of the same struggles but in the end are different in some ways as well much of european ethnonationalism is predicated on the idea of indigenous rights or a natural claim to the land due to a historical legacy their people were either the first settle claim that area or were the dominant group of many that came to populate it white nationalism meanwhile does not use the same moral justification it cannot we are not indigenous to lands outside europe in fact our justification is based off of necessity due to out group threats and a desire to maintain our way of life in the face of hostile cultures you will even see europeans sympathizing with american indians over white americans due to the similarity in both groups plights europeans view what happened to american indians as a cautionary tale of what happens to an indigenous people if they allow hostile invaders to get a foothold in their land am i right to feel this way about being multi ethnic i would not say so a lot of the disdain that europeans express towards american mutts is due to political differences more than anything you do not typically hear them saying similar things about canadian mutts or australian mutts do you some of it is surely in jest and some of it is just a side effect of the european view of americans due to our foreign policy issues you have to also keep in mind that many european ethnic groups are a result of different tribes coalescing into a single group over time the french are a result of latin germanic and celtic peoples for instance in the end we define our boundaries by what we can reasonably establish an in group from not so much from absolute purity and europeans are no different in this regard how should we anglosphere whites approach our racial identity nationality and culture must be taken into account white americans have a common identity and culture we have just been told for decades that we both do not have one and have one but it is wrong to celebrate it the answer to this is that we have a pretty good idea of who we are and there is nothing wrong with acknowledging and wanting to preserve that any other thoughts on what i have said the divide across the atlantic is not impassable respect and admiration between the two sides is currently a one way street i agree but much of this is not due to some sort of ethnic racial condescension once america stops sticking its nose where it is not wanted then much of this will clear up while i do maintain that we have different ideologies in the end we are still natural allies our common racial and cultural roots make it so so do not become a self hating europhile i see this a lot and it is pathetic there is much to be proud of as a white american and there is no reason why we should not consider ourselves equals and approach europeans as such

name: Saturnine83
body: there are a few important distinctions to be made between this sub and r altright 1 the rules are different in particular we generally do not accept vulgar or low quality content you will notice that we do not have much in the way of memes for instance you could make the argument that this is the reason why our popularity has not soared like r altright did and you would probably be right but it also does not draw the ire of the reddit community to the same degree either 2 the mod team is different to be clear i have nothing against the mod team that controlled r altright however you will notice that there are obvious differences in how we moderate our communities 3 the community is a little different there certainly some overlap and i am a part of that but a lot of the people from r altright did not care to migrate over to here after that subreddit was shut down part of it was due to many of them writing off reddit for good but i think that the differences in content i mentioned in part 1 of my answer was the main reason this subreddit is as much about the discussion of news articles and current events as it is about ideological hypothetical discussion for some people that is not as interesting as memes and that fine i appreciate pol style content as well some of it just does not work here 4 this subreddit does allow leftists antifas to debate with us here that was not allowed in r altright some people feel more comfortable posting in communities which are insulated from criticism while others may criticize them as needing a hugbox sometimes you just want to converse with like minded people without having to constantly be on the defensive i get that i still post on stormfront occasionally for that reason however unless a leftist is insulting people or trolling this subreddit i wo not ban them finally i do not really worry about us getting banned not because i think it wo not happen but because it is completely out of our hands we could be incredibly strict in our content and discussion and still get banned that said i will continue to try and make this subreddit as viable as possible within reddit sitewide rules while also maintaining its core mission which i interpret as being a place to highlight and discuss the plight of whites across the world

body: they are tough working class warriors and do bare a heavy cross for their beliefs pretty much how i view them i met a few skinheads during my time in various orgs in the 00 most were as you say working class they did not care as much for online discussion or keeping up with wn literature ideological conversations were basically viewed as navelgazing to most of them they knew where they stood they expected to know where everyone around them stood and idle contemplation was a waste of time most of us in the na saw them as the foot soldiers of the movement they had their part to play and it was not that of the intellectual hashing out the finer details of our ideology they desired community brotherhood and strength and while they may view people like pierce oliver or klassen as effete intellectuals there was still a sense of camaraderie the working and lower classes dealt with racial conflict before it spread to the suburbs they responded to an immediate threat with a display of strength skinhead groups mainly grew out of areas where whites were threatened but did not have the financial means to retreat i respect the idea of a brotherhood of whites banding together for strength regardless of what shape it takes i have never been terribly interested in being a part of the skinhead movement simply because on a socioeconomic and ideological level i do not fit in i am noticeably upper middle class by my mannerisms and how i speak i did not grow up on the streets where fighting was a way of life my views are nuanced my hobbies and interests are probably quite different from theirs the aesthetics are exciting sure but beyond that i do not really see the appeal i am not embarrassed by skinheads if that what you are wondering i do not condemn them or seek to exclude them it not my cup of tea but i am glad that when push comes to shove we have some formidable people on our side that are ready and willing to go to battle with us

body: since most people are reducing this down to a very oversimplified answer i will rev up the autism and give you a detailed response there is white used as a purely racial term which denotes the ancestry of a person is european in origin by this i mean that all of their ancestors can be traced back to europe this is an idealized racial category it is a basis to draw from when crafting our ideology but it is not absolute in usage for most of us anyways then there is white as we use it in the practical sense it designates an in group which we would like to establish a nation around people that we feel comfortable looking at as kin in this sense the term is shorthand for a number of racial and cultural qualifiers which make someone seem like one of us for instance person a is from andalusia and possesses a non negligible amount of arab berber blood person a ethnically identifies as a spaniard which is a white ethnic group generally appears european and is culturally european person b is a bosnian whose entire ancestry hails from europe they ethnically identify as a bosnian racially white they appear european but strongly identify with non european cultural elements islam person a would be considered white for practical purposes person b would only be considered racially white person a would be allowed to live in a white nationalist country while person b would be rejected or at least so far as most american wns are concerned i am drawing mainly from pierce as far as this goes the basic criteria for what most wns would consider white when talking about a hypothetical wn nation are you must appear to be white you must identify racially as white you must identify culturally as european or a european derived culture the first point is simple everyone knows who clearly is not white the questionable ones we would defer to the latter two points the second point means that if your non white ancestry seems relevant enough to you that you would volunteer that information freely as a manner of identifying yourself racially then you are not white a person who is 1 8th amerindian but never mentions it and nobody knows would be welcome a person who identifies with that part of their background is not the third point excludes those who we feel would have a subversive effect on our society people who practice foreign threatening faiths or ideologies are not welcome people who identify culturally with non whites to the extent of abandoning their own culture are not welcome think whiggers and weeaboos this is my full opinion on the matter hope that clears it up for you

body: skinheads were largely the result of a bunch of punks in the 70s 80s who took the usually ironic usage of nazi imagery in punk rock at that time and tried to own it it was more about rebellion against the hippy and disco scenes than having close ties to actual national socialism then some genuine skinhead punk bands came onto the scene and the subculture was set the aryan brotherhood and nazi low riders formed in prisons as a response to black and mestizo gangs preying on unorganized white inmates over time they became just like every prison gang but for whites there is some overlap between them and the larger skinhead community but they are not one and the same i knew a couple of skinheads who did not seem especially violent or stupid i would consider the early founders of white nationalism to be people like rockwell oliver and klassen pierce definitely carried the torch from the 80s until his death though there were other orgs but the national alliance was the primary one creators the klan ci groups and natsoc groups kind of faded into the background and got heavily infiltrated and sabotaged i think a lot of us lost some hope when pierce died and the na fell apart due to infighting it was incredibly sad to see but what we are doing now is something that pierce and other old school wns would have been doing themselves if they had the tools at the time i do not know why so many people on the alt right want to keep a division in place between themselves and the previous generation of white advocates seems petty and counterproductive to me

body: also and more importantly there is no white nation only in america can anyone even contemplate the concept when one lives in europe it is considerably more clear that the english nation is not the german nation is not the dutch nation is not the italian nation a very important point that i agree with but a few small caveats to consider one being that there can be space for white nationalism in european countries which act as either unions of multiple ethnic groups such as switzerland belgium spain and the uk provided that the people of those countries desire that union and that the cultures are similar enough for the union to be beneficial or alternatively in a nation such as france which is nearly monocultural but the primary ethnic group is actually an amalgamation of a number of different recently assimilated tribal groups the successive waves of celtic latin and germanic tribes combined with relatively new yet mostly assimilated people from across the continent are all a part of the french ethnic identity today white nationalism is a legitimate cause in both of those situations however it does not make any sense whatsoever in the case of monoethnic nations such as germany or sweden though i suppose you could try to lump german nationalism or swedish nationalism in as a type of white nationalism but it does not really fit their sense of nationalism is ethnic nationalism which is similar but not the same as racial nationalism for the immigrant based nations such as america canada and australia white is the only practical way to categorize the people of european descent who live there very few people there are fully german or irish or polish etc and are now culturally identifiable as part of the nation they live in it always irks me when i hear other americans refer to themselves as irish when they are actually maybe 1 4 irish at most or say things like i can drink a ton because i am german when the only german thing about them is their last name and sometimes that is not even present no you are white just white white is your race and american canadian australian etc is your nationality therefore it only makes sense to refer to yourself as a white american etc it reeks of shame and insecurity when people want so badly to identify with parts of their ancestry that they essentially deny their obvious identity and white is an approximation which is fully acknowledged it has both a genetic and cultural connotation both are important and both are approximate it an idea but a very important one with rare exception you can discern who is and who is not white without knowing the exact details of that person ancestry yet it is difficult to precisely define in words it a way of establishing an in group which satisfies our desire to live amongst those that we feel kinship with and to be separate from those that feel foreign to us it is a path towards a healthier happier society for those of us in the west one we care about and feel a desire to contribute to because it is an extension of our ourselves and our identity

body: the american indians in north america if you include the aztecs and mayans were certainly much more advanced than their counterparts in africa those are two totally different timelines the mayans were perhaps on par with late stone age europeans as far as technology and culturally were maybe as advanced as iron age european civilizations it is said that sub saharan africans never even invented the wheel little changed in africa for nearly all of human history hardly any advancements were made until contact with arabs and europeans there are a few possible reasons for this one being their relative isolation from the rest of the functioning world as it developed another being their extraordinarily low iq compared to other racial groups that is likely due to the lack of environmental factors that were driving natural selection in other groups cold weather necessitates planning hence the need for greater mental capacity for foresight in areas with scarce food resources both the caucasoid and mongoloid racial groups likely evolved in cold weather environments hence their higher iq than the negroid racial group there is also something to be said for competition driving advancement european ethnic groups were forced to advance in order to survive there was always another tribe a valley away that wanted your land and resources for themselves and if you could not defend what you had they would take it this fostered cultures which prized strategy and preparedness something which even today seems to escape the black race sub saharan africa is a huge landmass with an abundance of food resources and no need to plan for changing seasons there was not as much of a requirement to advance when the population density was so low and resources were so readily available societal development typically correlates with iq anomalies exist such as north korea blacks in africa have an iq of about 74 on average while whites are around 100 and american indians sit at about 88 it makes sense that blacks would have the least developed societies whites the most advanced and american indians somewhere in the middle culture also plays a part in it but it is basically a result of race interacting with the environment so it is not an entirely different argument

body: one challenge of being red pilled is noticing degeneracy everywhere while not becoming an insufferable misanthrope incapable of enjoying any of the pleasures of our wretched age with how we view modern society it is almost impossible to not come across as an insufferable misanthrope a white nationalist would have to completely turn off any analytical capabilities in order to stomach almost anything in the media these days my list of shows that i enjoy watching grows shorter every year i find it increasingly difficult to avoid being preachy and argumentative in everyday conversations with people and there is no question that the entertainment complex built up around professional and collegiate athletics sportsball has become a cancer sapping the time money and self respect of otherwise rational white people around the world there is nothing more nauseatingly hypocritical to me than racialists who enthusiastically cheer on their favorite negro ball team they do this in private of course or with their set of friends that they do not discuss politics with however circular firing squads over important issues ultimately peripheral to the cause like religion and sexuality those issues are hardly peripheral i wish they were so that we could all unite under a racial banner but they are not i would say at least half of the white nationalists i have met were as concerned if not more concerned with the moral and spiritual state of the west as they are with the genocide of our race as someone who takes a secular amoral approach to race and politics this is more than frustrating and is the reason why i often feel like throwing my hands up in the air and calling it quits i have a feeling that sportsball fanfare is a widely held dirty little secret among the wn community considering this and the fact that we have more pressing issues than our entertainment preferences i do not think it should be allowed to become a wedge issue i admittedly lose respect for other wns when they let on that they watch sportsball but it is not something that i would shun them for too many people are willing to completely abandon an ideology if it means they cannot have fun in their everyday lives and for some people that fun is centered around sportsball it a part of human nature we just have to work around
